tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geofencing_notifications (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    location_id UUID,
    notification_type VARCHAR,
    notification_message TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE geofences (
    geofence_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    radius FLOAT NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE geofence_notifications (
    notification_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    geofence_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    notification_message TEXT NOT NULL,
    notification_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (geofence_id) REFERENCES geofences (geofence_id)
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    notification_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    location_id INT REFERENCES geofence_locations(id),
    notification_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    notification_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_locations (
    user_location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    entered_at TIMESTAMP,
    exited_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50),
    notification_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_geofence_notifications (
  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  notification_type ENUM('Enter', 'Exit') NOT NULL,
  notification_timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES geofence_locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE notification_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  notification_id INT NOT NULL,
  log_message TEXT NOT NULL,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (notification_id) REFERENCES user_geofence_notifications(notification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE geofence_rules (
  rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  rule_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  min_radius DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES geofence_locations(location_id)
);
